Environment: dev, test, prod
Project number (e.g., "005")
Location suffix (e.g., "weu", "swc")
Common resource suffix (e.g., "-001")
Project-specific resource suffix
Random salt for unique naming
AI Factory suffix for resource groups
Common resource group name prefix
User Admins OID list
User Admins EMAIL list

variables.aiServicesName: [replace(toLower(format('aiservices{0}{1}{2}{3}{4}{5}', variables('projectName'), parameters('locationSuffix'), parameters('env'), variables('uniqueInAIFenv'), variables('randomSalt'), variables('prjResourceSuffixNoDash'))), '-', '')]
variables.acrProjectName: [format('acr{0}{1}{2}{3}{4}{5}', variables('projectName'), variables('genaiName'), parameters('locationSuffix'), variables('uniqueInAIFenv'), parameters('env'), variables('prjResourceSuffixNoDash'))]
variables.miACAName: [format('mi-aca-{0}-{1}-{2}-{3}{4}{5}', variables('projectName'), parameters('locationSuffix'), parameters('env'), variables('uniqueInAIFenv'), variables('randomSalt'), parameters('resourceSuffix'))]
variables.miPrjName: [format('mi-{0}-{1}-{2}-{3}{4}{5}', variables('projectName'), parameters('locationSuffix'), parameters('env'), variables('uniqueInAIFenv'), variables('randomSalt'), parameters('resourceSuffix'))]

metadata.description: ResourceID of subnet for private endpoints

parameters.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('serviceSettingOverrideRegionAzureAIVisionShort'))), createObject('value', format('vision-{0}-{1}-{2}-{3}{4}', reference('namingConvention').outputs.projectName.value, parameters('serviceSettingOverrideRegionAzureAIVisionShort'), parameters('env'), reference('namingConvention').outputs.uniqueInAIFenv.value, parameters('commonResourceSuffix'))), createObject('value', format('vision-{0}-{1}-{2}-{3}{4}', reference('namingConvention').outputs.projectName.value, parameters('locationSuffix'), parameters('env'), reference('namingConvention').outputs.uniqueInAIFenv.value, parameters('commonResourceSuffix'))))]
